Hey Saybia fans!

THIS IS THE COMPLETLY CORRECT ALBUM FROM SAYBIA!!

No more f**king crap downloads from other torrent uploaders that has uploaded this album!

This album is a downloaded version with 192 kbps quality, but where the song 03 - The Second You Sleep was the CRAPPY version from the concert in Aalborg, Denmark, in 2003! That is just poor!

That is why I have BOUGHT the song online, converted it to MP3, and now you have complete Saybia album in great quality with all the songs as they would be if you bought the album from a store!

ENJOY IT! (I know I do now! :P)


Tracklist - Saybia - The Second You Sleep - 2002


1 -  7 Demons (3:29)
2 -  Fools Corner (4:11)
3 -  The Second You Sleep (4:17)
4 -  Snake Tongued Beast (4:14)
5 -  Joy (5:06)
6 -  Still Falling (3:33)
7 -  The Day after Tomorrow (3:55)
8 -  In Spite Of (6:14)
9 -  Empty stairs (5:20)
10 - The Miracle In July (6:42)
11 - The One For You (6:04)      

//Spunkieboy
